trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> to a string.

The <xref:System.Windows.StrokeCollectionConverter> converts a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> to a string that represents the <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection> in base-64, encoded Ink Serialized Format (ISF).
It is useful to store ink data as base-64, encoded ISF when it is not possible to store raw byte data, such as in Web pages.
XAML Text Usage
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.StrokeCollectionConverter"></xref> class.

Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.StrokeCollectionConverter"></xref> can convert an object of a specified type to a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides the format context.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> to convert from.
`true` if the can convert an object of type sourceType to a ; otherwise, `false`.
Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref href="System.Windows.StrokeCollectionConverter"></xref> can convert a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> to the specified type.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides the format context.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> to convert to.
`true` if the can convert a to the sourceType; otherwise, `false`.
Converts the specified object to a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
The <xref:System.Windows.StrokeCollectionConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> method returns `null` if `value` is not a <xref:System.String>.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
The <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> to use as the current culture.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to convert.
A converted from value.
Converts a <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref> to a string.

The <xref:System.Windows.StrokeCollectionConverter.ConvertTo%2A> method returns `null` if `value` is not a <xref:System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection>, or if `destinationType` is not <xref:System.String> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor>.
The <xref:System.Windows.StrokeCollectionConverter.ConvertTo%2A> method returns a base-64, encoded Ink Serialized Format (ISF).
It is useful to store ink data as base-64, encoded ISF when it is not possible to store raw byte data, such as in Web pages.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
The <xref href="System.Globalization.CultureInfo"></xref> to use as the current culture.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to convert.
The <xref href="System.Type"></xref> to convert to.
An object that represents the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Ink.StrokeCollection"></xref>.
destinationType is `null`.
Returns whether this object supports a standard set of values that can be picked from a list, using the specified context.
An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that provides a format context.
`false` in all cases.
